text: Q #41 | multiple Choice Type | Award: 2 || Penalty: 0.6666 | Computer Networks The code 10011101 is transmitted using the standard CRC method. The generator polynomial is 2° + 1. Consider the following possible errors in transmission: « E1 : Suppose that the third bit from the left is inverted during transmission. « E2 : all ones in the bit stream are inverted to zeros during transmission. Which of the above errors can be detected at the receiver's end? A.Only E1 B. Only E2 C. Both D. None
